place_description: Popular spot offering draft brews & deli sandwiches amid a convenience store, plus outdoor seating.

reviews_data.review_text: This spot is a vibe. There's beer on tap, ton of craft beer in cans, and a full bodega selection.
Pretty good vegan options like sandwiches and cookies, has a fridge full of vegan foods like salads sandwiches and some desserts
This is excellent.  Come get a beer and sandwich here.
The music is fantastic and the atmosphere is awesome!
Sandwiches, candy, and beer; thunderous! Will be back!
Tried this place for breakfast after some friends had recommended it.  Counter person was terse and short when I asked questions about the menu.   Grits were watery and undercooked. Hard pass.

This is now the second time I've had a bagel sandwich from here only to get home and find out they forgot the meat?!? If they would have forgotten lettuce or something I would understand but the meat is a pretty big thing to leave out and kinda ruins the whole order, especially when you pay extra for double.
Overpriced, staff not friendly.
Nice laid back vibe lots cool stuff to choose from dog friendly!

Most fun bar in Charlotte. Itbhas the alternative crew, and amazng selection of beers and wine. There is even vermouth from Spain! Fun place, very refreshing, especially in comparison to your typical cookie-cutter sports bars.
Amazing

It is a nice place to meet people and relax outside for a little while.  Food and drinks are expensive for what they are in my opinion.

REALLY giving it 3 stars because they refuse to be a part of the new social district and will police your drinks now.  It is just annoying and unnecessary.  I had purchased things from them and was outside enjoying a drink from another location but they still refused to let me stay with my drink.  I had a receipt showing I had just made a purchase from them within the last 10 min for more than the price of the drink.  It is ridiculous that they do not want to be accepting of the new social district and just comes off as rude to me.  Sometimes things around you change and you have to accept that Common Market
Great spot, funny bartender is a plus. Front patio was packed so didn't spend any time there, but the back patio was super chill. Love that it's a store and a bar. Will definitely be going back.
Go use the restroom and get stuck reading the walls!
Phenomenal vegan sandwich options, good vibes, great coffee, extensive beer selection!
The food is delicious and there's so much to choose from.
My favorite place to go on a Saturday for a sandwich and a beer
The turkey panini sandwich is delicious.

I've been around CM ever since I was a little kid. Being able to go regularly as an adult feels just as exciting, but now I can actually drink the beers. Deli is amazing as always, so fresh and delicious. No better place to grab a beer and sub in all of Charlotte.

Violently ill at the moment because Common Market's deli gave me chicken instead of vegan chicken. I haven't eaten meat in 5 years. I've been a regular at Common Market ordering this wrap often and will definitely not be going back now.

DON'T BOTHER if you are looking to meet friends for a few hours and visit.
CM feels they own everything from the PUBLIC SIDEWALK to "the view" as said by employee.
So, view me GONE !

I've always heard of this place but never actually visited. We had parked right in front of this location, so as we decided to head home, we wanted to stop in and see what the place was all about. It's like a continence store as soon as you walk in, but the further you walk in, they have a bar with seating and then a section selling wines, beers, seltzers, and regular sodas to coffees and anything else you may find at a gas station. Outside of the store, they have an open patio with plenty of seating. A lot of people go and purchase their beverages and then come outside to sit drink and have a good time. It's a quirky cool place, and I'm all for it. Love the ambiance and concept of it. The employees and everyone were super friendly, and there were no issues at all. I will def be visiting again.
Dope spot...great atmosphere.  I play (DJ) there every Thursday night from 9pm-11pm.
Amazing place. I enjoyed hanging out here so much. Great selection of beers

This was a really cool place with a chill vibe. We had sandwiches which were pretty good. They had a little bit of everything and had a really great choice of beverages. The coolers had some great captions which we thought were humorous. The cookies they sell are the bomb! Will def visit again when in Charlotte.
Good sandwiches and cool spot.

Great people, great vibe, the food.... Less than great. I've been here for lunch and for snacks on separate occasions.  It's ok for snacks, and alcohol selection but not food. I came here today, for I quick bite, and got the Spicy Grilled Turkey.. it was honestly a little disappointing. Almost enough to trigger a mental breakdown. But if you're hungry and craving a very simple and possibly sad sandwich, this is the place. I rate the lunch menu  6.5/10. But this place is great overall. And I would come back, just not for the food.
Just read about a six year old who had to go to the ER because staff there sold him THC candy and didn't say a word, how is that legal?
Not service dog friendly
The original CM. Accept no substitutes.

Very cool spot with an eclectic feel. Some pretty good sandwiches and salads there that were very fresh and made to order. They have a cool selection of snacks and drinks to go with your meal too.

Def a vibe and there was plenty of outdoor seating.
Good selection of drinks. Good place to hangout on the patio
I loveeeeeeee Cherokee and his crew in the kitchen. Best humans that put love in your food. I love walking into this place and seeing those smiling faces.

Cool little place, but the wrap I got was flavorless and had maybe 2 slices of turkey in it. It's a small business so I dont wanna drag it too hard, but you can't serve food like that and expect good reviews. Maybe I got the wrong sandwich, but whatever. Bad sandwich, cool atmosphere. Just dont get the Old Scratch.
Had a blast  can't wait to go back ask for Zak he knows what he be talking about
Great

Cool spot to meet some degenerates and drink some funky brews and snack on some fun stuff. Been coming here for years. Wish they would stay open later during the week. I'm just happy they sell Magner's now.
Coolest spot in Charlotte
Cool place to hang out
Always the most chill place. Blake has created such a unique culture.
Should be called the communist Market. This is where American ideas and morals go to die. God bless America and let's all pray for this country and each other.

One of my favorite places to be. Great people, cool stuff, awesome atmosphere. A real anchor of the community. It's been described to me as "one of the gayest places in Charlotte", and I can confirm that's true. An awesome place.
Stopped in for after dinner drinks & had a wonderful experience.
Chill, quirky hangout with the BEST sandwiches. Worth the wait. Try the turkey Capri, tuna, and turkey Ruben.
Extremely rude staff
A great venue for having a drink and playing some chess or just hanging out !
Great Sammies!

The common market. Aka the living room of plaza midwood. Great drink selection. Its an eclectic mix of new faces and regulars every time I go. A charlotte staple, and plaza midwood oasis. 5 stars, dude

Great staff, interesting variety of items, nitro stout on tap is chefs kiss , breakfast and lunch are both delicious.

This spot represents everything that is great about Plaza, inclusive, fun, interesting.

It's a great hangout spot with all kinds of beer, wine, kombucha, seltzer, as well as non-alcoholic drinks.  They have a deli, but I have not eaten from there yet.  Most people hang out on the patio out front, but there is also an alley with tables, chairs, and benches behind the bar.
I stopped late night for wine. Looked awesome, nice selection, loved the ambiance.
Chill vibe! Staff is helpful and friendly. I'm in there daily to pick stuff up!  I haven't eaten at the Deli yet but have heard great things! Will probably check it out this weekend!
One of my favorite spots in Charlotte. Great atmosphere, no judgements and good subs. Check it out for sure :)
Cozy bar inside and great outside patio.
Best place to find some mead and enjoy all the dogs/people.
Perfect liberal store
Love this place- prices, food, vibes, staff are all amazing.
There is no space more chill, nor a selection as wide as The Common Market.

I love this spot! Staff was amazing and courteous. I had a veggie wrap and it wasn't too bad but I could tell it had been sitting in the container for quite a while so I would pass on that. I love the environment and choices of drinks w/ much variety.
Deli, beer store, bar and shop all in one

Delicious ham, egg, and cheese on whole wheat.  Terrific selection of snacks and beverages.  A bit expensive but it's located on prime real estate in a very trendy neighborhood.  The local flea market and it's distance from so much to do makes it worth while.
Nice place
Dope place to chill. Wish they would bring Hip-hop Wednesdays back honestly.

4.5/5
Service was great! Atmosphere is 10/10. Reminds me of being in someone's bedroom. It's a comfortable setting and I can see why locals flock here.

The sandwiches are basic but good. The half star is for the sourdough bread. It's too reminiscent of plain white bread and slashes the quality of the sandwich. A decent sourdough with a real crust or significant flavor would take the deli section to the next level.
They have a very extensive craft beer selection and cannon bottle. I have a large number of craft beer on draft at the bar.
Greatcplace to find rare and unusual beer, wine and cider. They also carry Moonjoy Mead! Great food, friendly staff fun customers. LGBTQ friendly
Lots of beer variety!
I always come here for vegan options and recently tried the tomato soup and was so surprised at how good it was. Who knew tomato soup could be something I would want to go back and visit for?!
What a gem.  Breakfast sandwich far exceeded my expectations.   And they have gluten free bread that is good.  Wine and beer hall with cool patio out front.  I'll be back.
Fire. Try it.
Loved the Spicy Turkey Sandwich.   Great selection of beer as well.
It was pretty cool
Had a great time, dude at the cash register and I had a good laugh when I almost gave him a $25,000 tip accidentally. Definitely some good people as well as food and drink offerings here.

If you haven't stopped by and peeped out "the original", "OG"  Common Market, then do yourself a favor and check them out. The deli is an excellent choice for breakfast and lunch, the coffee is always good and hot, and the beer and wine selection is top-notch. If you have questions, dont be scared to ask one of the many charming, helpful, and wonderful staff. During summer, yuck it up with your friends on the  front porch any evening, and I guarantee you'll meet somebody you didn't know you needed to know before. During winter, warm inside, either beside the in-house pour bar, or deli side, baking in the sunlit front window seating. Either way, check em out. Apparently, they got locations all over Charlotte now, too. Cheers!
A great place to be social, find some food, a drink, even some basic groceries. Have met some incredibly unique and genuine people here and the staff is great too.
Cool, eclectic place with great sandwiches and a very wide beer selection and lots of novelty items. A Charlotte treasure.

Unfortunate encounter with one of the ladies who was extremely rude when it came to a purchase my group was apart of. When I came to her to ask why and to get more information on the situation to get educated, she kept the unprofessional attitude. Made it awkward enough not to come back.

One of the cashiers was bluntly rude. This was my second visit, how does she have a job there compared to the other employees? The rest of my experience will have me back for another sandwich! Thanks y'all!

I love this place. I love their food. I get a wrap there and it's to die for, plus they have tons of options for my vegan friend! The atmosphere is amazing too. It's the perfect relaxed hang out spot.
Really nice Deli and market, great beer selection
Always a ho to where visiting Charlotte.

The 4 guys working at the deli are slow and very rude for no reason. The rest of the place was dope but I had to take off 2 stars for that customer service. Talking bad about customers in front of other customers is never okay.
WOW. called Derek at plaza midwood. what a clown!  point blank said he had no time to help me because he was too busy. way to succeed in basic customer service. taking my business elsewhere.
This is my home. The place to drink my life away and make new friends
I'm looking forward to coming back here
I had amazing vegan sandwich.
Excellent cider selection
Quirky restaurant/bar/store with a patio. Great location with an eclectic customer base. Fun place overall.
So awesome!!! I love this place. Common Market has a love, peace and happiness vibe. Reminds me of my places back in the 90's ...totally giving me life!!
Overpriced sandwiches
Past several times, has taken 30+ minutes to get sandwiches. There were 4 guys working in the deli, they wernt understaffed during any of my visits, simply unorganized, and not focused on food prep.
I work next door and stop in almost daily. Love the sandwiches and the staff is always friendly!

Aces! Was going here back in the day when it was this place, Thomas st, and the penguin, and not much else. Moved away and have been gone a long time. Back for a visit , Rip penguin, thankfully you guys are still around. Missed this place. And still as good as i remember
Nice

I love the common market atmosphere.
It's a cool spot to hang out and grab coffee or a beer and the sandwiches are great. Staff looks super cool.
Fantastic place
Food was nice. I enjoyed my tuna melt very much.
Really dig the basement feel.  Great sandwiches and beer!!!!!

Nice Lil  hipster/hippie ..hangout...
Great beer selection..
But I hate the guilt trip checkout....with tips suggestions loaded on the tablets..
Look you bring me beer is one thing..
Me getting my own beer and paying it...is another
Commonwealth staple
One of my favorite places in Charlotte. I always stop by their deli when I'm in Plaza midwood.
I love Common Market. I get off work, walk across the street, and get myself a slice of cheesecake.
Come for the grungy vibe. There's internet but it's not working. And there are tables.
Dope little spot in Plaza Midwood to see, be seen and see about what you wanted to see.
Extra protein.
Great atmosphere!! Laid back. Grab a sandwich and a drink of your choice and just enjoy the day or night.
Great neighborhood vibe! Dope cast of locals and new comers sharing picnic tables and beverages
Good food & drinks, better people - all kinds of people. And dogs
Unique spot. Bodega style coffee and wine shop. Diverse crowd.
Cute place w nice drinks and lots of ppl w dogs passing by
My favorite place to hangout and snack in Charlotte
Very cool ambience
Bunch'a weirdos in this here watering hole. Staff and customers alike. I love it here.
Was our 1st time..new to the area.food was great

Great vibe, chill staff, great beer and soft drink selections, and they have a bar section for drafts and wine. Drinking is allowed on-site, so buy a beer and they'llpop it open for you.They have snacks, novelties, and a sandwich shop on-site. Great place to catch up with friends and have a drink (doesn't have to be beer)
Love the vibe of this place, the sandwich was super delicious and the drink selection is outstanding. Great place to have lunch outside on the patio.
Love the vibe here! This place feels like Austin. A lot of great choices. Prices are very fair. And was thrilled to see vegan options on their menu. Definitely gonna be our go-to place.
This place is great.  Great beverage selection, both adult and non adult, and the reuben was amazing

Eclectic, loud, bohemian, cozy, artistic, interesting... it's all that and more.  They have a deli, I haven't tried it but they seem to have a very active business.  I go there for the coffee (how can it be so good?), the wine and the vibe.  People of all kinds!  And all kind.  They also have plenty of beer to buy and they do beer and wine tastings.  And have all kind of local sweets.  I would recommend it for the open minded.
Extremely cool, authentic place. You see all types of people here, races, classes, ages. Great beer selection, good vibes. Good sandwiches in the daytime. The gem of Plaza Midwood
Love this place
Very nice and helpful staff. Great place to chill on a warm afternoon. Grab a bite, grab a drink, and enjoy the company
I really enjoy this place and always bring out-of-towners. Unpretentious vibes and great service, I'll continue going back.
Breakfast sandwiches are amazing

I go over for the Rainbow Cake, Chocolate Hummus and great atmosphere of the place! The staff is always welcoming, especially in the Deli area!! Great find for me and so many others!!
Ramona!!
Great food great service.  Tuna fish sandwich was on point
A delightful and unique experience.  Friendly staff and good vibes. Big plus is pets being allowed. I love taking my dog along for adventures
Great white Pizza
It was my first visit. The food was wonderful
Pretty crowded for a gas station but the drag show was amazing!
Great place, Atmosphere, Drinks
One of last cool places to eat and drink

A trendy deli but also kinda run down.  Not my kind of place.

Decent food for fair price considering it's Charlotte but forgot my grilled cheese, not sure if an honest mistake or trying to get one over on me.  Patio is...ok.  Mediocre is the word that comes to mind.

Common Market is ALWAYS fun! I think you kind of have to have a sense of humor and whimsy in order to work there. The staff is great, the selection of beer, wine, vegan options, and kitsch is amazing, and the vibe is always upbeat and fun.

The burrito with ghost pepper cheese is one of my favorite breakfasts in Charlotte. It's THAT freaking good. We usually go in the morning so we can have breakfast, but one of these days I need to try their lunches.

The bartender was extremely knowledgeable and made some excellent suggestions. I went home happy! We've also taken the dogs a few times and sat on the patio, which is fun, and I don't know if they still have it on the weekends because I work, but they used to do a small farmer's market out front. Loved that!
A Plaza Midwood Staple! Great food, beers, and service

I just love CM in general, but the one in Oakhurst is closer to my daughter and a bit more spread out.

I love everything about it...employees, ambience, prices, selection...all of it! The sandwiches are also great, as is the coffee. And they have Delta 8 gummies, which help with my knee pain!
Eclectic market with great menu and food choices
They allow smoking on the patio and guests just put their butts on the floor.  Other than that great food and atmosphere.  Worth checking out.
The food was prepared after ordering. Old time atmosphere. Loved it
Cool place. Great wine special on Tues.
Great vegetarian and vegan options
This was a cool store with glasses of wine and beer.
Was a pretty nice place, the sub shop was easy to figure out, but I'd say the main thing that caught eye was the two halfs of the boat on 2 parallel walls. kinda made it look like it wrecked there.
Its a local favorite
LOVE THIS PLACE!!!

Use to be a really chill place back in '08-2016 when it was one of the Eastside's little hidden cultural gems, live bands, great interesting people, but now gentrification has ruined and sucked all the charm out of it. too overcrowded and noisy, also no more live music. Now it's just another boring Charlotte bar.
my first time here and i was excited

we ordered through the phone earlier, and the guy at the deli sounded pretty upset (not sure why?).
we had ordered a chicken salad sandwich & an egg salad one, but when we got home, i realized my egg salad sandwich was actually a chicken one as well...  which was very dill-heavy (i believe that's the herb used), not into it.
Always a good time. Basically anything you could want, they have...even tentacle fingers!!!!
This place honestly has the best breakfast in town. My favorite is the J Wrap. Coffee is also phenomenal, cheap and locally brewed !!!
Great beer selection and vibe!
Love this place

Really cool place to hang out, I came when the jon G BBQ truck came.  Amazing selection of beer, wine list didnt look to bad either.  Awesome vibe. Very diverse patrons, awesome conversations.. good opportunity to meet new people.
Delicious and creative samdwiches. Friendly staff and the market has a wide selection of wine and beer.
Such a good vibe. I love being able to come pick some single beers and hang out.

I've always loved the Common Market and it is still amazing, even after 15 years from when I first stepped inside! It's definitely a gem in Charlotte. The deli makes amazing food!! Their sandwiches are incomparable to anywhere else. The ingredients they use are always top notch!! Along with their amazing beer and wine selections, I'm also excited they have a small sake section, too! And, of course, they still have a ton of weird items to purchase, which used to be the highlight of my visit back in the day.
Cheap gas no problem
Great sandwiches and beers. Mt favorite is the chicken salad deluxe.
Good deli sandwich.
They have things you can't get and just a common market.
Great spot for a great samich. Awesome beer and chip selection too.
This place is Charlotte
Socks
place is fine, clientele is a bit sketch

Fun concept of general store with beers on tap and a sandwich shop. Rueben was great. Limited picnic table style patio with fun mix of patrons and place to watch the neighborhood go by.  Parking on street or in rear and room to lock bikes in view.
Great staff and friendly people. You must go check it out!
Ja, das ist gut!

I'd love to have another experience here - but the sandwiches that we ordered weren't out of the world delicious. They were yummy, but maybe my expectations were too high. The vibe of the place is very unique, and it is refreshing amidst the uppity places that Charlotte normally offers.

My favorite place to grab a beer and talk with some friends. They have such a large assortment of beers and wines and don't get me started on their deli 

Went here on a date. Cool spot if you're low maintenance.

Great build your own 6 pack of craft beers. Love the pimento cheese sandwiches. It has an outdoor patio for morning coffee or having lunch with friends. Always great and friendly staff! They have Hilarious magnets and merch for sale. Stop by and and get a soup and sandwich! I highly recommend!
Top tier beer and cider selection
Nice place
Such an awesome place. Great beer, decent food and get ambiance
Always a chill spot
Horrible service...The lady working this Saturday morning needs manor training... I have been a customer for over 20 years... She is the one reason I will never go back...

This is one of the few places that has a menu item that I crave - The Later Hater breakfast sandwich that I get as a wrap. They grill it so that the pimento cheese melts and creates an oozy cheesy yummy start to my day. And they have the best coffee- Jags Head.

The people the conversations and the selection of beer would be enough but this establishment actually has really good food. Fresh meats, veggies and breads to rival the best NY style Deli. Daily specials and one off sandwich combos make this a refreshing pitstop in the area. Biggest selection of chips to accompany your desired handpiece will make this a regular break in your food choice. Tins of snacks and random edibles line the checkout and truly make this a unique stop and shop.
It's common market my guy duh
Fun, energetic, and eccentric eatery and store. Great food, including vegetarian and vegan options and a helpful, friendly, staff. Highly recommended!

Not sure why I have to hold 10+ minutes just to place an order.  Fix your system.  This is the point of a call in.  No other restaurant or food establishment would make their call in orders hold for more than a few seconds.
My favorite place ever!
It's a vibe
Love your breakfast sandwiches. But your app for the plaza midwood location always adds a $1.25 to add cheese to the breakfast sammy. Please fix!
Best place for a beer and good Talk!
This place has the best of everything you need on the way to another.  Make sure to stop by
One of the go to places when in the Plaza Midwood area. Great food and drinks.
Always a great time.  The staff is great and knows you.  The prices are very fair....and I yeah they are never closed.  No matter what happens.  Thanks Blake and staff.

Such and awesome hang out joint, def local spot.  Love the beers on tap here, and the choices to buy in the cooler are awesome as well.  Perfect spot to grab a sandwich and couple of brews.  Not to mention, one can practically pick up day to day stuff here in one stop.  The staff is really chill and cool.  I love the relax, easy going vibe here.  Food is tasty, beer is fresh.  Stop by and give them a try, check out the different art all over the walls on your stop, you will be glad that you did.

My first choice for places to grab anything from breakfast to lunch and especially meet friends for a much need drink.

Staff is always friendly and helpful. Look forward to having Common in Rock Hill!!
Good

Great customer service and delicious food.  Awesome place to hang out, get a beer or wine.  Casual, but if you show up in a tuxedo; it is not unexpected.  Also a great place to find a gift, for that one person who has everything!

Lots of people got here too socialize and have drinks. They have a great selection of beers on draft which are changed periodically and is excellent wine selection by the glass and by the bottle. There's a limited menu for food and they have a great chef.
Always something happening at CM
Love this place! Nice chill spot for drinks, snacks and sandwiches! They got all the drinks and junk foods
I love all my weirdos and I love that there is a neat space where we can all find each other on a daily basis
The Common Market is life! Always a pleasure to hang out and hangout with friends. The only place that is truly what plaza Midwood stood for many. Home. Food. And Good company.

I normally don't leave reviews but the attention to detail the deli has is TERRIBLE. I've ordered from their Deli 10 times and they've messed my sandwich up at LEAST 8. Do yourself a favor and don't order from the Deli because I can almost guarantee you they will find a way to mess it up.
great place great environment great culture.
Yes.

The people here are really laid back, and also helpful/kind. Cool selection of just about everything you'd need for a fantastic front porch afternoon, whether it's your porch, their porch, or porches beyond!
Absolutely awesome,so many varieties of beer n ales and everything in between, just blows my mind, fantastic place !!!
Awesome laid back atmosphere. Great beer selection
Always enjoy my visits.  Friendly staff and lively but safe environment. I'm there alot and would recommend.
Such a chill place. Huge variety of beer, wine and energy drinks. Very interesting variety of things in here
Hidden gem with great beers and noshes.

One of my all time favorite places to go in Charlotte! Great beer, even greater people, and yes they sell Dunhills! Do yourself a favor and stop by!
Find me on IG: @rah.giovanny
The staff is always helpful, the drinks are always flowing and the food is great!

45 mins (called and ordered ahead) for 2 breakfast sandwich, 1 of which didnt have the correct toppings. It's almost as if they started making it when I got there to pick up. Bummed about waiting, but time is free.
Clean and cozy. So many different foods to try and they all looked great. Hip and trendy  great place for lunch, business or a date!
Best pimiento cheese grits EVER!  Seriously sublime.  Always been good - somehow getting even better!!  Outstanding!!
Love Common Market, all locations! Great deli food!!! Large Variety of snacks and drinks! Great people and service!
It is what it is. A Charlotte staple.
Masks required  - food really good  - service so so
Bacon, egg, and pepper jack on an everything bagel
Food was good, took a little long to get my chicken salad sandwich. Staff was friendly.

Good healthy atmosphere, great staff and a great place to meet people for the first time over the last 15 or so years I have made countless lifelong friends, thank you CM for all you do for our neighborhood.
Love the place. Reminds me of a place in Asheville years ago called Vincent's Ear. Totally laid back and will be returning for a beer on the patio.
The drinks aren't worth it, crowd is lame, and my bartender would not stop farting.
The food and beer was on point if you want to try different types of beer that's were you need to go
Awesome vibes
Sandwiches, beers, wines, and great crowds.
An absolute staple of Plaza Midwood and Charlotte! Your not a local if you don't frequent this place.
The BEST of PLAZA MIDWOOD PPL, FOOD & FUN...
Overpriced wares however the deli is great
No need to go anywhere else
Common Market never dissappoints!!
This place is great. Big beer selection and the deli food is delicious right in the heart of Plaza Midwood
Great selection of soda and beer unique snacks
Unreal
Chicken salad deluxe on rye FTW

Love Love this place! It's like its a different place in time. They offer so many things from  local vendors to unheard of...but it doesn't disappoint.. The Deli serves meat to meatless dishes, homemade desserts and sodas of nostalgia. My favorite is DR.BROWNS BLACK CHERRY.  Definitely a must go if you haven't already!
Great  deli restaurant
une classique
Good people
Sick vibe, great sandwiches
Place is awesome, good pricing, good beer selection in both tap and canned, staff is always on point, and the crowd usually peaceful, great place to relax and have a IPA
Plaza midwood institution
The heart of Plaza Midwood.
Great sandwiches
Love their chickenless chicken salad.  My favorite!
Laid back atmosphere to try different beers and wine.
Bring hand sanitizer lol
great place to hang out
Local hang out spot with mead and beer and wine and you can dine or imbibe on the patio and people come hang out and do art or chill and the food is awesome too.
Awesome place to hang out in Charlotte, will return.
Awesome

I love, love, love this place.  There are so many beers that you cannot find anywhere.  The best part is the staff knows beer!  They can guide you through the droves of  beer and make stellar recommendations.

The food here is really good too however, sometimes the wait can be a little long.  It's a nice grab and go place but there is also seating inside and outside.  Inside can be a little cramped with other shoppers but it wasn't bad.
Market!
